Class VibTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • molecule.VibTransformer

  • public class VibTransformer
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VibTransformer(Molecule molin)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[][] dq2x(double[][] xx, int[] mm, double[] dq)
      Adds deviations dq to the current geometry, i.e.,
      x_new = x_current + L x dq
      Note that the deviation is added to the current geometry.
      double[] gx2gq(double[] fullgrad)
      Returns a gradient in terms of vibrational coordinates.
      double[][] hx2hq(double[] fullhess)
      Returns a Hessian matrix in terms of vibrational coordinates.
      double[][] q2x(int[] mm, double[] qq)
      Transforms qq to xyz coordinates, i.e.,
      x_new = x_0 + L x qq
      Note that the current geometry is overwritten.
      void setup(Molecule molin, int nd) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • setup

        public void setup(Molecule molin,
                  int nd)

      • q2x

        public double[][] q2x(int[] mm,
                      double[] qq)
        Transforms qq to xyz coordinates, i.e.,
        x_new = x_0 + L x qq
        Note that the current geometry is overwritten.
        Parameters:
        mm - mode combinations
        qq - vibrational coordinates
        Returns:
        the xyz coordinates of the molecule

      • dq2x

        public double[][] dq2x(double[][] xx,
                       int[] mm,
                       double[] dq)
        Adds deviations dq to the current geometry, i.e.,
        x_new = x_current + L x dq
        Note that the deviation is added to the current geometry.
        Parameters:
        xx - the current geometry
        mm - mode combinations
        dq - deviations
        Returns:
        the xyz coordinates of the molecule

      • gx2gq

        public double[] gx2gq(double[] fullgrad)
        Returns a gradient in terms of vibrational coordinates.
        Parameters:
        fullgrad - gradient
        Returns:
        Gradient in Q

      • hx2hq

        public double[][] hx2hq(double[] fullhess)
        Returns a Hessian matrix in terms of vibrational coordinates.
        Parameters:
        fullhess - hessian
        Returns:
        Hessian in Q
